oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two Native American women with baby
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: infants; Native Americans; women;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Two Native American women in full costume, one woman holding a child in her lap.
Text on front:
One of her & child
Text on back:
Gift
Mrs. Clark
